B

Board - Class in <Unnamed>
Connect 4 Board Class All methods required to manipulate the board are found here.
Board() - Constructor for class Board
No argument constructor for Board class.

C

clearBoard() - Method in class Board
Method to clear the board.
cpuBlockVictory(Board) - Static method in class Game
Method for the CPU to block opponent's winning move if available.
cpuConstructThree(Board) - Static method in class Game
Method for the CPU to try to create three in a row for itself, thus setting up a future win.
cpuExecuteBestMove(Board) - Static method in class Game
Method for the CPU to execute the best move based on current board state.
cpuTryToWin(Board) - Static method in class Game
Method for the CPU to try to win if a winning move is available by scanning the board.

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Game() - Constructor for class Game
 
getBoard() - Method in class Board
Accessor method to get the current board state.
getEmptyCells() - Method in class Board
Accessor method to get the number of empty cells on the board.
getWinner() - Method in class Board
Method to check for a winner on the board.

I

isColumnFull(int) - Method in class Board
Method to check if a column is full.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
Main line method to run the connect-4 game.

P

placeCell(int, char) - Method in class Board
Method to place a piece in a specified column.
playerMove(Board, Scanner) - Static method in class Game
Method to handle the player's move input and validation.

T

toString() - Method in class Board
Method to print the current state of the board.
